para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具体取决于值的属性由该控件的控件，调用此方法是方法检索剪贴板格式的表示的单元格的值。Depending on the value of the property of the control, this method is called by the control's method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell. 此方法与位置相关的参数指示此单元格位于由选定单元格中定义的区域表示的数据的表的控件。The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the control. 具体取决于单元格的位置，格式设置信息可能是此方法返回除了单元格的值。Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value. 例如，某一行的第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括指示某一行的开头的标记。For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row. 受支持的剪贴板格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

span.span: is not -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为列自动设置此属性属性设置为。This property is set automatically for columns with the property set to . 您必须自己设置此属性时按使用的列进行排序属性设置为。You must set this property yourself when sorting by columns with the property set to . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用中以编程方式排序的属性。The following code demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort.
